Summary: Bright white/blue light, silently traveling right to left. Way too fast to be a jet or helicopter
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in my living room, reading a magazine when suddenly i saw a bright white\blue light traveling very rapidly across the sky, about 40 degrees above the horizon.it was so bright, it was easy to spot at attracted my attention right away. i saw it out a three huge windows totaling about 15 feet wide and 8 feet tall, where i can see a large part of the night sky. it was quiet in the house, and there was no noise made at all by this object, which appeared to be about a quarter mile away. it was going so fast, i've never seen a plane travel at that rate before. at first, i thought it was a firefly, but it was far too bright and going much faster than any firefly could move. it only took a few seconds for it to cross completely across my field of view. it moved straight across without stopping.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Germantown
There were no other sightings in Germantown on or around July 17th 2008
